heading: HR00017
0: RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE FOR THE IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF ALL POLITICAL PRISONERS, INCLUDING THE ELDERLY, THOSE WITH ILLNESSES, THE WOMEN, THOSE IMPRISONED FOR MORE THAN TEN (YEARS), AND, DETAINED COUPLES, FOR JUST AND HUMANITARIAN REASONS, AS WELL AS THE RELEASE OF DETAINED CONSULTANTS OF THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF THE PHILIPPINES (NDFP) IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE JOINT AGREEMENT ON SAFETY AND IMMUNITY GUARANTEES SIGNED BY THE GOVERNMENT OF THE PHILIPPINE AND THE NDFP
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00017
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO R.
